member.name: T:RoyTheunissen.AudioSyntax.AudioSyntaxMenuPaths
member.summary: Defines useful constants for menu paths so that we don't redefine those over and over. NOTE: These needed to be duplicated for the precompiled DLL, no avoiding it.

member.name: M:RoyTheunissen.AudioSyntax.StringExtensions.ToHumanReadable(System.String,System.Char)
member.summary: Gets the human readable version of programmer text, like a variable name.
member.returns: The human readable equivalent of the programmer text.

member.name: M:RoyTheunissen.AudioSyntax.StringExtensions.ToUnityPath(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the slashes to be consistent.

member.name: T:RoyTheunissen.AudioSyntax.EditorAssetReference`1
member.summary: Helps you access an asset at editor time. Useful for finding code templates, for example.

member.name: T:RoyTheunissen.AudioSyntax.MigrationVersion
member.summary: Responsible for managing the version of the system, which is stored in a AudioSyntaxSettings scriptable object config but we do not want that type to be pre-compiled because then it would be a lot harder to modify / it would increase the complexity of the package a bunch. So we have to jump through some hoops to get/set the version from that config because we cannot reference its type.

member.name: T:RoyTheunissen.AudioSyntax.MigrationWizard
member.summary: Window to show to users when they haven't set up the FMOD Syntax system yet to let them conveniently initialize it with appropriate settings.
Window to show to users when they haven't set up the FMOD Syntax system yet to let them conveniently initialize it with appropriate settings.

member.name: T:RoyTheunissen.AudioSyntax.WizardBase
member.summary:
Base class for Wizards like the SetupWizard and MigrationWizard. Helps draw boxes with conditions that either fail or succeed depending on the current system status.
Needs to be pre-compiled just because the MigrationWizard needs to be.
